About The Festival

In addition to being BC's first farmhouse-themed beer festival, Farmhouse Fest is committed to giving craft beer lovers a high quality experience, centering around a universal, shared love of the art.

Tell Me More

About The Location, UBC Farm

Location matters, even for beer festivals. Farmhouse Fest will be held at the UBC Farm, immediately after the UBC Farmers Market, emphasizing the complementary relationship between local food and beer.

Where Is That?

Featuring Unique & Limited Brews by Some of the Best Breweries
